q1: Is Kylian Mbappe and Neymar great forward players in the Paris SG soccer team?
a1: They are great forwards, who will score many goals this season. Do you support Paris SG?
q3: I can see Mbappe outscoring Neymar this season. It's going to be a nice battle between them two.
a3: I do not see it as a battle, I think it will be the best duo of the year
q4: do you think they win ligue 1?
a4: Yes, I think they are favorites to win the league.
q5: Who are their main rival contenders for the title?
a5: Lyon and Marseille are both top teams.
